message.name: BRIDGE_PARAM_VALUE_1
message.description: Emit the value of a onboard parameter
message.field: Target altitude above home for RTL mode. Maintains current altitude if set to -1. Rally point altitudes are used if plane does not return to home.
Defines the distance from a waypoint, that when crossed indicates the wp has been hit
Defines the radius of the loiter circle when in RTL mode.
The action to take on a short (FS_SHORT_TIMEOUT) failsafe event
The action to take on a long (FS_LONG_TIMEOUT seconds) failsafe event.
Enable ground control station telemetry failsafe.
Target airspeed in cm/s in automatic throttle modes. Value is as an indicated (calibrated/apparent) airspeed.
This controls whether to use dead-reckoning or GPS based navigation
Enables airspeed use for automatic throttle modes and replaces control from THR_TRIM.
Enables automatic adjustment of ARSPD_RATIO during a calibration flight based on estimation of ground speed and true airspeed.
Distance in meters between camera triggers
This controls use of GPS measurements
